name: Twisted Music Before and After Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I will give you lyrics from each song, in order. You provide the Before and After answer. Each answer may involve two or three songs. 
Who could hang a name on you?
So gently swaying through the fairyland of love
And the thought of lovin' you is getting so exciting.
questions.explanation:
Ruby Tuesday Afternoon Delight.

	"Ruby Tuesday"- Rolling Stones "Tuesday Afternoon"- Moody Blues "Afternoon Delight"- Starland Vocal Band (a one-hit wonder!)

questions.text:
The world still astounds you,
And this bird you'll never change.
questions.explanation:
Born Free Bird.

	"Born Free" was the title track to the movie about Elsa the lioness, while "Free Bird" is a Lynyrd Skynyrd hit.

questions.text:
A winter's day, in a deep and dark December
I got sheep, I got cows, I got horses, I got pigs, I got all livestock
questions.correct: I Am a Rock Island Line
questions.explanation:
I Am a Rock Island Line.

	"I Am a Rock", by Simon and Garfunkel, is a song of loneliness and isolation, while "Rock Island Line" is a folk song sung by many, including Johnny Cash.

questions.text:
Distant roads are callin' me
If you're lost you can look--and you will find me
I've looked around enough to know.
questions.correct: No Time After Time in a Bottle
questions.explanation:
No Time After Time in a Bottle.

	"No Time"= the Guess Who"Time after Time" is a well-used title; this one's by Cyndi Lauper."Time in a Bottle" is a moving Jim Croce song.

questions.text:
Happy birthday,
Rollin' at sea, adrift on the water
I got some groceries, some peanut butter, to last a couple of days.
questions.correct: Happy Birthday to You Light Up My Life During Wartime
questions.explanation:
Happy Birthday to You Light Up My Life During Wartime.

	We all know "Happy Birthday"!You Light Up My Life " was an insipid Debbie Boone song, while "Life During Wartime" was a driving tune by the Talking Heads.

questions.text:
I see the girls walk by dressed in their summer clothes
Got me so blind I can't see
questions.explanation:
Paint it Black Magic Woman.

	"Paint it Black"= Rolling Stones"Black Magic Woman"- Santana

questions.text:
Eyes that shine burning red, dreams of you all through my head. 
No possibilities of getting what I need.
questions.correct: Black Dog and the Butterfly&Black Dog and Butterfly
questions.explanation:
Black Dog and the Butterfly&Black Dog and Butterfly.

	"Black Dog," by Led Zeppelin, has absolutely nothing to do with dogs. "Dog and Butterfly" by Heart doesn't have much to do with them, either.

questions.text:
It looks like muskrat love
And the eagle flies with the dove.
I need somebody to love.
questions.correct: Muskrat Love the One You're With A Little Help From My Friends
questions.explanation:
Muskrat Love the One You're With A Little Help From My Friends.

	"Muskrat Love" was a syrupy Captain and Tenille song.  "Love the One You're With" by Steven Stills, received much more critical acclaim. And we've all heard "With A Little Help From My Friends," by the Beatles.

questions.text:
Don't bother asking for explanations
When you're going insane.
questions.correct: Year of the Cat Scratch Fever
questions.explanation:
Year of the Cat Scratch Fever.

	"Year of the Cat," by Al Stewart, is a song with beautiful imagery, while (in my oh-so-humble opinion,) "Cat Scratch Fever" is a suggestive song by a loathsome animal-killer...er, Ted Nugent.

questions.text:
Earth below us, drifting, falling.
The world is, the world is, love and life are deep
questions.explanation:
Major Tom Sawyer.

	"Major Tom," by Peter Schilling, continues the story of Major Tom begun in David Bowie's "Space Oddity." "Tom Sawyer" is by Rush.
